CustomField.formula:
IF( ISPICKVAL(Filing_Stage__c, "Completed"), "Completed",
IF( ISPICKVAL(Filing_Stage__c, "Cancelled"), "Cancelled", Text( Today() - DATEVALUE(Filing_Stage_Timestamp__c) - 2*( floor((today() - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7) - floor((DATEVALUE(Filing_Stage_Timestamp__c) - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7)))))
CustomField.label: Days in Current Filing Stage
